title: New: Rips – Gone
body:
With 2013 heralding the supposed long-awaited ‘return of guitar music’, newly formed Brooklyn outfit **Rips** go to show that making such predictions is an utterly pointless task, by tearing up the handbook, and exploding onto the scene with this fantastic debut track, despite not even having existed when those initial predictions were formed.

The new musical outlet of **Four Visions** aka Daniel Abary, this debut track _Gone_ is far more energetic and raw than anything he’s done before, much more The Strokes meets Wavves than the dream-pop Abary has dappled in before. Check it out below.
